timeline.message:
[NETBEANS-4368] Fix test file navigation dialog

Fixes resizing of test file selection when navigating to test file.
Files are sorted by path.

timeline.bodyText: Just a note: I usually put the inner classes at the very end of the class (usually below //~ Inner classes comment). No need to change it in this PR, I just think it makes the code more readable (main class and then inner classes, not mixed).
timeline.author: tmysik
